name: Stafford Leather Chair with Arms - China Clay
description: Smooth, creamy leather upholstery, a well-padded seat and curved arms for extra comfort – it's hard to beat the classic Stafford Dining Chairs. It might be an adaptation of the original popular design, but the arms that feature on this version only add to the overall charm. As with the rest of the Stafford Range, this armchair is finished with studding and has a handle crafted into the back to make it easy to move and manoeuvre around the dining table.
